snippet.title: The Masters: Survival Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Katana is testing the new Virtual Proxy Simulation, which is going to be used for training, as she fights the evil creatures known as the Shadow Dwellers. All is not what it seems however as she dives deeper into the system...

Check out our Kickstarter and merch with the links below to support the project!

Currently this game is still in development, but we want to give everyone access to play this for feedback and support purposes. This will help us get this game more fully realized. The completed full version will be released on Steam and possible other platforms when the game is finished.

We will be attempting to have a mobile version with touch controls of the demo released later. 

Download the alpha demo here:
https://royalflushstudioz230.itch.io/the-masters-survival

Buy merch:
https://www.redbubble.com/i/t-shirt/The-Masters-Survival-Design-1-by-Ace230/73005843.FB110

Royal Flush Studioz website:
royalflushstudioz.com/masterssurvival

Credits:
Created by: Matthew Weldon

Voices:
Jude Weldon - Katana
Cody Morrison - Regan
Chris Weiss - Vlaykre
Matthew Weldon - Sabre

Particle effects created by (via Epic Marketplace):
Dragon Motion 
DC Assets
Kakky
NadirVFX
Anil Koylu
#gaming #indiegame #hacknslash #kickstarter #topdowngame #unreal4 #themasters
